divs: Sighting DetailsUpdate to report filed earlier today on bright red ball spewing sparks. The object was on the left side of the car, heading south on Hwy 400. Orion was visible. October 21 and 22 are the Orionids meteor shower. This shower has often been reported with fireballs or bolides. Watching the media for any signs it impacted in Innisfil, or Cookstown.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Barrie
There was one other sighting in Barrie on or around October 22nd 2008
